dimensions.name: Trust & Safety
key_points: Children experiencing brain atrophy due to lack of oxygen during childbirth

analysis.summary: The review expresses extreme dissatisfaction with the hospital's service quality, particularly in the maternity ward. It highlights instances of negligence during childbirth, rude nurse behavior, and concerns about children suffering brain atrophy due to oxygen deprivation. The sentiment is overwhelmingly negative, indicating a severe issue with patient care.

key_points: Lack of reassurance during long wait times

dimensions.name: Clinical Care
key_points: Pain still persistent after 3 months post-Caesarean section
Poor stitching and excessive use of staples causing prolonged pain

dimensions.name: Trust & Safety
key_points: Prevented from seeing child in the nursery for 2 weeks and from breastfeeding under the pretext of not taking a vaccine

analysis.summary: The review expresses extreme dissatisfaction with the clinical care received during a Caesarean section, highlighting ongoing pain and discomfort due to poor stitching and excessive use of staples. Additionally, the reviewer mentions feeling deprived of seeing and breastfeeding their child, contributing to a negative emotional impact.

analyzed_reviews.text: I visited there 5 years ago. Wonderful atmosphere...medical standard is very high. Competive staff....My Elder bro also had been a part of it's medical Team. Now he is doing his medical practice in Scotland. He told me that the standard set in Prince sultan Milt hospital is far high nd better than in entire UK.

analysis.text: I visited there 5 years ago. Wonderful atmosphere...medical standard is very high. Competive staff....My Elder bro also had been a part of it's medical Team. Now he is doing his medical practice in Scotland. He told me that the standard set in Prince sultan Milt hospital is far high nd better than in entire UK.
analysis.summary: The review is highly positive, emphasizing the excellent service quality and high medical standards at Prince Sultan Military Hospital.

Iâ€™m rating the hospital 5 stars just because how professional the midwife Hamidah Binti Mansor was with me!! Sheâ€™s very professional, explained the whole admissions process to me without making me paging for explanation or details like most of the others the that department (Obstetrics and Gynecology Emergency)

Thanks for your kindness Hamidah !! I hope the all the midwifes staff like you especially the head of the midwives who was in charge on 4/6/2020 in the morning shift as she needs to develop her communication skills and be just like you!

analyzed_reviews.text:
The hospital is located in a very populated area, parkings are scarce and the only parking building there is almost reserved for hospital staff and the rest of parkings are chaotic.

This vital compound should be relocated elsewhere in the outskirts of Riyadh to relieve congestions that plagued this hospital for years.

This vital compound should be relocated elsewhere in the outskirts of Riyadh to relieve congestions that plagued this hospital for years.
